Subject: Devil and ETC
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 113
From: KSLawdogg@...

Unicron/Teufel:



Unicron opened his mouth, a sonic blast erupting to intervene all shots 
heading for him.

"My creation, we must take our leave of this battle."

---

Teufel dodged some shots, pointing his arms in different directions.

Twenty-five laser bolts from the shoulder cannon and two missiles from the 
cannon on his wrist on his right arm headed for the Cybertronian Fire.

The shoulder cannon on his left fired twenty rapid laser bolts at Dollen.  
The cannon in his wrist fired off two missiles at Zardus.
